text: Yvonne Furneaux (born 11 May 1928 in Roubaix, Nord-Pas-de-Calais died 5 July 2024) is a French movie actress. She is known for her role as Emma in La Dolce Vita. ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:People from Roubaix
title: Yvonne Furneaux
